snippet: BARCHAT--Seymour, 89, January 14, 2016. Award winning artist and engraver, his watercolors, oils, and prints have been shown nationally. Beloved husband of Steffanie, he leaves his sister Muriel, four daughters, and six grandchildren. Admired and loved by family and friends, he will be missed by all who knew him. 1/3
lead_paragraph: BARCHAT--Seymour, 89, January 14, 2016. Award winning artist and engraver, his watercolors, oils, and prints have been shown nationally.
